Package com.chairbender.object_calisthenics_analyzer.adapter

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalisthenicsVisitorAdapter
    Abstract class representing any class which looks for some problem with the code and reports it as a CalisthenicsViolation.
    FirstClassCollectionsVisitorAdapter
    Tries to detect that all classes that has any Collection member has NO other members, so that all collections get wrapped.
    NoElseKeywordVisitorAdapter
    Checks that there are no usages of "else" Created by chairbender on 11/21/2015.
    NoGettersSettersVisitorAdapter
    Checks that the class doesn't define any obvious getter or setter methods.
    OneDotPerLineVisitorAdapter
    Checks that there is only one dot per line Created by chairbender on 11/21/2015.
    SingleLevelOfIndentationVisitorAdapter
    Checks that there is a single level of indentation per method.
    SmallEntitiesVisitorAdapter
    Ensures that all classes are no more than 50 lines.
    TwoOrFewerFieldsVisitorAdapter
    Checks that each class has only two or less fields/members.
    WrapAllPrimitivesAndStringsVisitorAdapter
    Tries to detect that all primitives and Strings are wrapped, meaning that any class that declares primitive fields must have only ONE such field.
